snippet: Gov. Phil Bryant signed a bill on Thursday called the Mississippi Religious Freedom Restoration Act that opponents worry could lead to state-sanctioned discrimination against gays and lesbians.
abstract: Mississippi Gov Phil Bryant signs bill that supporters say will assure unfettered practice of religion without government interference but that opponents worry could lead to state-sanctioned discrimination against gays and lesbians.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Phil Bryant signed a bill on Thursday called the Mississippi Religious Freedom Restoration Act that opponents worry could lead to state-sanctioned discrimination against gays and lesbians.

headline.main: Mississippi: Governor Signs Law Called Antigay
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Governor Signs Law Called Antigay
